mapper.select: SELECT count(*) AS count ,email AS email ,password AS password ,nickname AS nickname ,user_type AS userType ,marketing_yn AS marketingYn ,use_yn AS useYn ,certified_yn AS certifiedYn FROM adgomin_user WHERE 1=1 AND email = #{email} GROUP BY user_order, email

SELECT media_order AS mediaOrder ,media_title AS mediaTitle ,thumbnail_img_nm AS thumbnailImgNm ,thumbnail_origin_file_nm AS thumbnailOriginFileNm ,thumbnail_img_file_path AS thumbnailImgFilePath ,media_price AS mediaPrice ,ad_detail_category AS adDetailCategory ,T3.nickname AS nickname ,T2.region AS region ,T2.ad_category AS adCategory FROM adgomin_media_register T1 LEFT JOIN adgomin_media_introduce T2 ON T1.email = T2.email LEFT JOIN adgomin_user T3 ON T1.email = T3.email WHERE 1=1 AND ad_detail_category IN ("유튜브", "인스타그램", "페이스북", "블로그") AND T1.media_submit_status = 'Y' LIMIT 0, 10
